roleset.name: to impose or command, imposing, commanding, deciding, telling
roleset.note: DICTATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dictate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from dictate.01-v predicate notes)
DICTATING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to dicatate.01. Dicatate.01 is a member of VN class transfer_mesg-37.1.1. Framed by Katie. (from dictating.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The laws of heredity dictate that half of the plants springing from these greenhouse-produced seeds will be male sterile and herbicide resistant and half will be male fertile and herbicide susceptible .
example.arg: that half of the plants springing from these greenhouse-produced seeds will be male sterile and herbicide resistant and half will be male fertile and herbicide susceptible

example.name: With arg2
example.text: What's going on today in Martyr Square dictates a new national political game to Speaker Berri, as well as the Lebanese parties involved.
example.arg: What's going on today in Martyr Square
to Speaker Berri, as well as the Lebanese parties involved.

example.name: All args
example.text: The General's dictation to the troops that they immediately prepare for battle was obeyed.
example.arg: that they immediately prepare for battle

example.name: Can't take the Dr's name if it is a S-RED and outside the span

roleset.name: speak aloud for someone to write down

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: The doctor's dictation of her notes was later transcribed by her secretary.
